snippet: LEAD: ''We've gotten every conceivable break. The wind, the weather and the location of the accident all work to our advantage. But no one should confuse good luck with good planning.''     - Gray Davis, chairman of the California State Lands Comm...
lead_paragraph: LEAD: ''We've gotten every conceivable break. The wind, the weather and the location of the accident all work to our advantage. But no one should confuse good luck with good planning.'' - Gray Davis, chairman of the California State Lands Commission, talking about Wednesday's oil spill. [A14:1.
